titleStmt.title: Peace, and no peace: or, a pleasant dialogue betweene Phil-eirenus, a protestant, a lover of peace. And Philo Polemus, a separatist, an incendiary of War, sutable [sic] to the times. By Richard Williams, Master in Arts of the famous University of Cambridge, and preacher in London at Saint Martins Vintrey.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Richard, b. 1606 or 7.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
